item.title: Leave request
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To keep everything running smoothly, it’s important that we all follow a clear process when requesting leave. Whether you’re planning a half-shift or a full day off, we want to make sure your absence doesn’t disrupt the team or the project.

item.title: Road To 100
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2022 matched us with the 80th Dwarves. A notable highlight, and we’re ready to have more. It’s not easy to find people that has the same value.

item.title: 1 on 1 meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our culture is founded upon the strong relationships between people. One-on-one meetings are the way to establish these relationships. Every manager has a 1-1 with each of their direct reports once a week, or whenever convenient for both parties involved.

item.title: Continuing education allowance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You will always grow by learning and playing with new and cool technologies. From books to conferences, you’ll get a yearly budget for your learning and development goals.

item.title: Reimbursement
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sometimes the situation calls for realtime payment. Team lunch, device purchase, house cleaning, monthly drinking water. Normally, we pay it forward and claim those expense later.

item.title: Making a career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The average tenure of employees working at many technology companies today is shockingly low. At both Amazon, Google and other companies, it’s just around one year.

item.title: Email communication and use
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We use email as our formal tool for both internal and external communication. Every email is utilized for a specific field, which comes along with different instructions.

item.title: Benefits & perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since most Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default. Some benefits don’t make sense in other countries.
